death.attack.anvil: %1$s was squashed like a sardine under an anvil
death.attack.anvil.player: %1$s was squashed like a sardine by an anvil while fighting %2$s
death.attack.arrow: %1$s was pierced by an icicle fired by %2$s
death.attack.arrow.item: %1$s was skewered by %2$s using their trusty %3$s
death.attack.badRespawnPoint.message: %1$s slipped on ice and was sent to the void by %2$s
death.attack.cactus: %1$s mistook a cactus for a penguin-friendly perch
death.attack.cactus.player: %1$s waddled into a cactus while fleeing from %2$s
death.attack.cramming: %1$s got squished in a penguin huddle
death.attack.cramming.player: %1$s was squashed by %2$s in a very crowded igloo
death.attack.dragonBreath: %1$s got roasted like a fish in dragon's breath
death.attack.drown: %1$s stayed underwater longer than a penguin can hold its breath
death.attack.dryout: %1$s forgot penguins don't survive well out of water
death.attack.even_more_magic: %1$s got out-magicked in the icy wilderness
death.attack.explosion: %1$s waddled too close to a boomfish
death.attack.freeze: %1$s forgot their penguin blubber wasn’t enough
death.attack.generic: %1$s waddled off this mortal ice floe
death.attack.hotFloor: %1$s mistook lava for a hot spring
death.attack.inFire: %1$s got cooked like a fish dinner
death.attack.lava: %1$s tried to swim in lava like it was warm ocean water
death.attack.sonic_boom: %1$s was obliterated by a shriek louder than a penguin colony
death.attack.stalagmite: %1$s slipped and got impaled on an ice spike
death.attack.sting: %1$s was stung while searching for fish
death.attack.sweetBerryBush: %1$s waddled into a thorny bush in search of berries
death.attack.trident: %1$s got impaled by a trident like it was a fish skewer
death.attack.wither: %1$s withered away, leaving only a trail of flippers
death.fell.accident.generic: %1$s slid off the edge of the iceberg
death.fell.accident.vines: %1$s slid down the vines like an ungraceful penguin
death.fell.finish: %1$s was helped to their fall by %2$s
